tool.name: Correct GeneMarkS Gene Model
tool.help:
**What it does**
GeneMarkS starts by producing an ancient GFF format. That has to be corrected with Regex to load as GFF3. Once that's done, you'll notice that features are of type "CDS" but their IDs are "gene_*" and there are no parent gene features.
This tool adds the parent gene feature and renames the features nicely.
